text: Analytic philosophy is a branch of philosophy that was important in the 20th century. Analytical philosophy focuses on the philosophy of language, mathematical logic and on argumentation. Important thinkers of this movement include Gottlob Frege, Bertrand Russell, Ludwig Wittgenstein and Willard Van Orman Quine. == Related pages == *Metaphilosophy *Ordinary language philosophy Category:Branches of philosophy
title: Analytic philosophy
